column4: hello, i had a problem with the new ubuntu, i tryed to install it under windows 7, but after the restart theres no bootmanager where i can choose ubuntu.
hmm, I'm not sure wubi supports win7 yet... so the boot screen just gives you windows as usual?

I don't know what kind of boot manager win7 uses, but presumably wubi has problems with modifying it to make it boot, I know dual-booting with ubuntu on separate partition and grub as the main bootmanager should work though..
